kpi.cnname: 地区, 实时工单总量, 省监控未派单, 分公司未受理,分公司未回复,待归档工单,七天归档工单,地区号
kpi.sql: select getareaname(todeptid)tableA,count(sheetid)tableB,sum(T1_undo)tableC,sum(T2_unacp)tableD,sum(T2_undo)tableE,sum(unhold) tableF,sum(hold) tableG,todeptid deptid from ( select m.sheetid,m.todeptid,t.taskname,t.taskstatus,decode(taskname,'FirstExcuteHumTask',1,0) T1_undo,decode(taskname,'SecondExcuteHumTask',decode(taskstatus,'2',1,0),0) T2_unacp,decode(taskname,'SecondExcuteHumTask',decode(taskstatus,'82',1,0),0) T2_undo,decode(taskname,'HoldHumTask',1,0) unhold,decode(m.status,1,1,0)hold from commonfault_main m,commonfault_task t where m.sendtime > sysdate -7 and m.status<>'-14' and m.deleted <>'1' and m.mainnetsortone = '101010405' and m.mainfaultresponselevel = '101030401' and m.id = t.sheetkey(+) and t.ifwaitforsubtask(+) <>'true' and t.taskstatus(+) in ('2','8') ) group by todeptid order by todeptid
